channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish on pavement, 4th August
item.description:
Overflowing bin and rubbish on pavement. 9 The Close Beckenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow and white lines are not visible, 4th August
item.description:
Yellow lines and white parking bay lines are no longer visible down Gwydyr Road,Bromley, BR2. Just as you come into Gwydyr Road there are 2 garages on the left and one off street space and one garage on the right. The yellow lines have not been visible for over 6 months now and people continue to park across my access so I can't get my car out. Can these lines please repainted and preferably with white lines so no one can park there at any time as this is causing me much upset. Kind Regards
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gwydyr Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Watering bag not working, 4th August
item.description:
Hello! I have been watering this tree regularly, the watering bag is usually filled with water but this Oak is suffering, I think the watering bag isnâ€™t working - maybe the holes in the bottom which are supposed to the let water leak out slowly are blocked

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Median Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Tree cut from stump, 4th August
item.description:
A tree was cut from its stump and all the scrap was not collected but was instead dumped in-front of my property, chunks of wood have also damaged my tyres coming in and out my drive, it has been a couple of months since its been cut but was not taken away at the same time, it is outside of 25 Valence Road, DA8 3JT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valence Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Residents at no.5 have our street looking like a tip, 4th August
item.description:
Look at the state of Hopedale road this morning. Residents at no5 are filling a trolley every night and then sending their young kids out after midnight to dump rubbish across the street. This needs sorting asap!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hopedale Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to school zebra crossing bollard, 4th August
item.description:
Damage to the school zebra crossing bollard. The bent bollard is now blocking the pavement and access to 2 properties. It is hazardous and dangerous as the crossing is in constant use, and the public would need to step out onto the road to avoid the broken bollard and use the pavement, putting them at risk of being hit by oncoming traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 262, Beulah Hill, Upper Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree on bend at Goodge Place, 4th August
item.description:
There is some sort of disease damaging the leaves of the tree on the East side of the tree. The leaves are crumpling and some seem to be covered in a sort of wispy grey fungus-like growth.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Goodge Place, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
